member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartAxis.MajorTickOverlap
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative overlap of major axis tick. The range of values is from 0 to 1. The default value 0 means no overlap,when the overlap is 1, the whole tick is inside the plot area.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartAxis.MajorUnit
member.summary: Gets or sets the major unit (distance between labels).

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value shown on the axis.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartAxis.Min
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value shown on the axis.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartAxis.MinorTickOverlap
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative overlap of major axis tick. The range of values is from 0 to 1. The default value 0 means no overlap,when the overlap is 1, the whole tick is inside the plot area.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartAxis.MinorUnit
member.summary: Gets or sets the minor unit (distance between minor tick marks).

member.summary: Gets the FlexChart object that owns this axis

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.Opacity
member.summary: ​Gets or sets the opacity value applied to the plot element. Opacity overrides the Alpha color channel.

member.summary: Gets or sets the bound property name for plotting values along the y-axis.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the bound property to be plotted on the X axis.

member.summary: Gets or sets the chart type for the series.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the series-specific data source (overrides FlexChart.ItemsSource)

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.Name
member.summary: ​Gets or sets the series name. The series name is displayed in the chart legend. Series without names do not appear in the legend.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to fill in most plot elements (bar, area, line, pie)

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color for most plot elements (bar, area, line, pie)

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.BorderWidth
member.summary: ​Gets or sets the border thickness for most plot elements (bar, area, line, pie)

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.SymbolColor
member.summary: ​Gets or sets the color used to fill the symbols. Overrides Color/Fill property for chart types with symbols (LineSymbol).

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.SymbolBorderColor
member.summary: ​​Gets or sets the border color for the symbols.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeries.SymbolBorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the border thickness for the symbols.

member.summary: Gets or sets the series visibility

member.summary: ​Gets or sets the name of the x-axis for the series

member.summary: Specifies zoom mode.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartZoomMode.X
member.summary: Enable on X-axis.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartZoomMode.Y
member.summary: Enable on Y-axis.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartZoomMode.XY
member.summary: Enable on both X-axis and Y-axis.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartZoomMode.Disabled
member.summary: Disable on both X-axis and Y-axis.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartScrollPosition
member.summary: Specifies position.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartScrollPosition.Min
member.summary: Value scroll to as a min value.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartScrollPosition.Center
member.summary: Value scroll to is in the center.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartScrollPosition.Max
member.summary: Value scroll to as a max value.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType
member.summary: Used with HitTestInfo to determine the element selected.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.None
member.summary: No chart element.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.PlotArea
member.summary: The area within the axes.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.AxisX
member.summary: X-axis.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.AxisY
member.summary: Y-axis.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.ChartArea
member.summary: The area within the control but outside of the axes.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.Legend
member.summary: The legend.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.LegendSeries
member.summary: A series within the legend.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.Header
member.summary: The chart header.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.Footer
member.summary: The chart footer.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.Series
member.summary: A chart series.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.SeriesSymbol
member.summary: A chart series symbol.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartElementType.Annotation
member.summary: An annotation.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartLabelPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of data labels on the chart.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartLabelPosition.None
member.summary: No labels appear.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartLabelPosition.Left
member.summary: The labels appear to the left of the data points.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartLabelPosition.Top
member.summary: The labels appear above the data points.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartLabelPosition.Right
member.summary: The labels appear to the right of the data points

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartLabelPosition.Bottom
member.summary: The labels appear below the data points

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartLabelPosition.Center
member.summary: The labels appear centered on the data points

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerLines
member.summary: Specifies the line type for the LineMarker.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerLines.None
member.summary: Show no lines

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerLines.Vertical
member.summary: Show a vertical line.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerLines.Horizontal
member.summary: Show a horizontal line.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerLines.Both
member.summary: Show both vertical and horizontal lines.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerInteraction
member.summary: Specifies how the LineMarker interacts with the user.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerInteraction.None
member.summary: No interaction, the user specifies the position by clicking.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerInteraction.Move
member.summary: The LineMarker moves with the pointer.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerInteraction.Drag
member.summary: The LineMarker moves when the user drags the line.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the alignment of the LineMarker.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerAlignment.Auto
member.summary: The LineMarker alignment adjusts automatically so that it stays inside the boundaries of the plot area.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerAlignment.BottomRight
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the right of the pointer.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerAlignment.BottomLeft
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the left of the pointer.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerAlignment.TopRight
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the bottom of the pointer.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.Enums.ChartMarkerAlignment.TopLeft
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the top of the pointer.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType
member.summary: Specifies the chart type.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Column
member.summary: Column charts show vertical bars and allow you to compare values of items across categories.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Bar
member.summary: Bar charts show horizontal bars.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Scatter
member.summary: Scatter charts use X and Y coordinates to show patterns within the data.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Line
member.summary: Line charts show trends over a period of time or across categories.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.LineSymbols
member.summary: Line and symbol charts are line charts with a symbol on each data point.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Area
member.summary: Area charts are line charts with the area below the line filled with color.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Bubble
member.summary: Bubble charts are Scatter charts with a third data value that determines the size of the symbol.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Candle
member.summary: Candlestick charts present items with high, low, open, and close values. The size of the wick line is determined by the High and Low values, while the size of the bar is determined by the Open and Close values. The bar is displayed using different colors, depending on whether the close value is higher or lower than the open value.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Hloc
member.summary: High-low-open-close charts display the same information as a candlestick chart, except that opening values are displayed using lines to the left, while lines to the right indicate closing values.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.Spline
member.summary: Spline charts are Line charts that plot curves rather than angled lines through the data points.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.SplineSymbols
member.summary: Spline and symbol charts are spline charts with symbols on each data point.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartType.SplineArea
member.summary: Spline area charts are spline charts with the area below the line filled with color.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType
member.summary: Specifies whether and where the Series is visible.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Visible
member.summary: The series is visible on the plot and in the legend.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Plot
member.summary: The series is visible only on the plot.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Legend
member.summary: The series is visible only in the legend.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Hidden
member.summary: The series is hidden.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartStackingType
member.summary: Specifies whether and how to stack the chart's data values.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartStackingType.None
member.summary: No stacking. Each series object is plotted independently.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartStackingType.Stacked
member.summary: Stacked charts show how each value contributes to the total.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartStackingType.Stacked100pc
member.summary: 100% stacked charts show how each value contributes to the total with the relative size of each series representing its contribution to the total.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeriesEventArgs
member.summary: Event data for SeriesVisibilityChanged event of .

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartSeriesEventArgs.Series
member.summary: Gets the series of the event args.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartOverlappingLabels
member.summary: Specify how to handle overlapping axis labels.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartOverlappingLabels.Auto
member.summary: Auto hide overlapping labels.

member.name: F:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.ChartOverlappingLabels.Show
member.summary: Always show overlapping labels.

member.name: T:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart
member.summary: The control provides a powerful and flexible way to visualize data. You can use the control to create charts that display data in several formats, including bar, line, symbol, bubble, and others.

member.summary: Coordinate conversion from data point to screen point.
member.returns: The point which is relative the screen.

member.summary: ​Get the chart element at the specified point.
member.param: point to simulate a touch at.

member.summary: Use for axes collection after changed.

member.summary: Use for series collection after changed.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.AxisX
member.summary: Gets the main horizontal (X) axis.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.AxisY
member.summary: ​Gets the main vertical (Y) axis.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.BindingX
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the bound property to be plotted on the X axis.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.ChartType
member.summary: Gets or sets the chart type of all data series.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.Series
member.summary: Gets the collection of data series collections.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.Stacking
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart series are stacked. Options: None, Stacked, Stacked 100%

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.Rotated
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the direction of plotting is inverted. By default (inverted = false) the direction of plotting is horizontal. When inverted, the direction becomes vertical and the axes are swapped.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.LegendToggle
member.summary: Gets or sets whether clicking legend items should toggle the series visibility.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.InterpolateNulls
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to interpolate null values in the data. If true, the chart will interpolate the value of any missing data based on neighboring points. If false, it will leave a break in lines and areas at the points with null values.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.Axes
member.summary: Gets the collection of axes.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.Annotations
member.summary: Gets the collection of annotations

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.Selection
member.summary: ​Gets or sets the chart selection

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.SymbolSize
member.summary: ​Gets or sets the size of the symbols used for all serise in this FlexChart.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.DataLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the point data label.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.Options
member.summary: Gets or sets various chart options.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.LineMarker
member.summary: Gets or sets line marker.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.PlotAreaBackgroundColor
member.summary: ​Gets or sets the background color of plot area.

member.name: P:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.ForceClipAndroidPlotArea
member.summary: Indicates whether should force clip the plot area in android decices. This is to solve a Xamarin.Forms.Android overdraw issue which occured only in some very specific emulators. In most of the case, please just keep this property as its default value : false.

member.name: E:Xuni.Forms.FlexChart.FlexChart.SeriesVisibilityChanged
member.summary: ​Occurs when the series visibility changed.

member.summary: ​Occurs when a plot element is being loaded.

member.summary: ​Occurs when the selection changes.
